channel.title: [Added] Updates to various DAC CRS non-embedded codelists
channel.description:
I’ve sent [a pull request](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Codelists-NonEmbedded/pull/153) to bring various non-embedded codelists up-to-date with those published by the [OECD DAC](http://www.oecd.org/dac/stats/dacandcrscodelists.htm).
There are too many changes to detail here, but the update includes:
* Adding missing French translations ([e.g. for AidType](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Codelists-NonEmbedded/pull/153/commits/407f4a99b5d338985f11a6dccfd28e7c738d17b6)) * Marking withdrawn codes as such ([e.g. for Sector](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Codelists-NonEmbedded/pull/153/commits/ccbafc606dfe1b06231c499e0b7e684d79875434)) * Adding missing codes ([e.g. for FinanceType](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Codelists-NonEmbedded/pull/153/commits/ded288bf88f4f8f067eddfbb4b097ed3b07f488d))
I’ve broken down the updates into bitesized commits with descriptive commit messages, so diffs are probably easiest viewed per commit.

item.title: [Added] Updates to various DAC CRS non-embedded codelists
item.dc:creator: hayfield
item.source: [Added] Updates to various DAC CRS non-embedded codelists

item.title: [Added] Updates to various DAC CRS non-embedded codelists
item.dc:creator: hayfield
item.description:
The changes required by this proposal have now been made in the Non-Embedded Codelists Repository.

The values will appear on the website when it is next generated.

As such, I have marked this topic as [Added].

Read full topic

item.title: [Added] Updates to various DAC CRS non-embedded codelists
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
The IATI tech team have reviewed and approved this pull request. We expect changes to be implemented this week.

Read full topic
item.source: [Added] Updates to various DAC CRS non-embedded codelists

item.title: [Added] Updates to various DAC CRS non-embedded codelists
item.dc:creator: andylolz
item.description:
da20164 is a bit unusual, because some existing FinanceType codelist-items change category.

E.g. 210 ‘Interest subsidy’ goes from FinanceType-category 200 to 100. ‘Capital subscription on deposit basis’ (310) and ‘Capital subscription on encashment basis’ (311) both go from FinanceType-category 300 to 100.

Read full topic
item.source: [Added] Updates to various DAC CRS non-embedded codelists

item.title: [Added] Updates to various DAC CRS non-embedded codelists
item.dc:creator: andylolz
item.description:
I’ve sent a pull request to bring various non-embedded codelists up-to-date with those published by the OECD DAC.

There are too many changes to detail here, but the update includes:

  • Adding missing French translations (e.g. for AidType)
  • Marking withdrawn codes as such (e.g. for Sector)
  • Adding missing codes (e.g. for FinanceType)

I’ve broken down the updates into bitesized commits with descriptive commit messages, so diffs are probably easiest viewed per commit.

Read full topic
item.source: [Added] Updates to various DAC CRS non-embedded codelists
